item.description:
Federator N*1 is playing Anita Coelho's long running Wednesday night Ryles series!!

Federator N*1 is an 11 piece afro-dance, afro-beat band based in Boston featuring fantastic local talent (2 Berklee profs, Stan Strickland, and more...).

Only one year old, they've already made a name for themselves on the Boston scene - opening for Oumou Sangare, playing Johnny Ds, Church, the Paradise, and Berklee Spring Fest.

This show will let the spread out the afro-beat grooves to their fullest, as they get the whole night!

2 sets, only $10!

More info:
http://www.federator1.com/content/ryles-wednesday-world-music-night
https://www.facebook.com/events/173699592750678/
